page.title: 03S. Yorks. Times Extract 2
page.content: FRIDAY JULY 5th - MEXBOROUGH The old maternity ward at Mexborough montagu Hospital has undergone an extensive face-lift and is now re-opened as a dual mixed medical ward. The first sector, named Dearne, opened a month ago with 25 beds. Last week Cadeby sector took in its first batch of 10 patients in a 23 bed ward. It's all part of a Â£3.5 million development being carried out at the Hospital over the next three years. Maternity shut at Christmas, and mothers-to-be now go to District General Hospitals in the area.
